fields.description: Change titanium.py and project.py to support building, deploying and distributing BB10 applications. To test follow setup instructions at https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile_blackberry. There are also instructions on how to build/deploy/publish for BB10. Make sure the command-line and Titanium Studio can do the commands. Also make sure iOS, MobileWeb and Android are not effected.
fields.summary: Add BB10 SD support to common files in python based with CLI (see description)

comments.body: The pythons scripts now work fine. There will also be newer Node.JS CLI support
